summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2973, for the improvement of East 55th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to University Boulevard, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks on the north side thereof, with the necessary wooden crosswalks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 35849 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
